content.value:
Kritsanapoom Pibunsonggram (nickname: Jayler/JJ) is an actor, model and singer born in Chiang Mai, Thailand. JJ used to study for a bachelor's degree Faculty of Communication Arts in Rangsit University, but he decided to move to study film at the Faculty of Social Communication Innovation College from Srinakharinwirot University. He is graduated of highschool at The Prince Royal's College in Chiang Mai.

He is the first child in his family, he has a younger brother called PJ Mahidol. His great-grandfather was Plaek Pibulsonggram, ex prime minister of Thailand.

Kritsanapoom began in entertainment industry when was model at the 20th anniversary celebration of the "Central Chiang Mai" department store while still studying in 10th grade. There he met to the well known director Chookiat Sakveerakul who persuaded him to audition for his film "Grean Fictions" (2013). Thus, he debuted as an actor as one of the main characters, Oab, together with Fiat Pattadon, Pluem Purim and Jack Kittisak.

Since then he is an artist under Nadao Bangkok and has been working in a pile of films and dramas. He is in a relationship with thai-chinese actress and model Thanaerng Kanyawee Songmuang since 2016.

Also, JJ was a guitarist of the boyband "Sleeprunway" together with Jirayu La-ongmanee, Pluem Purim, Nontanun Anchuleepradit and Pond Chalat in 2015 and between 2018-2019 he was a member of the boy-group 9x9 (Nine by Nine) too. Both aren't active now.
